Serialized Form

  • Package Chat

    • Class Chat.ChatGui extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • networker

          ChatConnectionHandler networker
          Object that performs all networking and IO

        • incoming

          javax.swing.JTextArea incoming
          Display of incoming messages

        • outgoing

          javax.swing.JTextField outgoing
          Input field for outgoing messages

        • connections

          javax.swing.JList<E> connections
          List of active connections

        • connModel

          javax.swing.DefaultListModel<E> connModel
          Data model for connections list

        • host

          javax.swing.JTextField host
          Input field for new host connections

        • port

          javax.swing.JTextField port
          Input field for port to connect to

        • nickname

          javax.swing.JTextField nickname
          Input field for name to assign to new connection

        • connect

          javax.swing.JButton connect
          Button to push when adding a new connection

        • disconnect

          javax.swing.JButton disconnect
          Button to push when removing an existing connection

    • Class Chat.Checkers extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

    • Class Chat.Checkers.Board extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • board

          CheckersData board
          The data for the checkers board is kept here. This board is also responsible for generating lists of legal moves.

        • gameInProgress

          boolean gameInProgress
          indicates if a game is currently in progress

        • currentPlayer

          int currentPlayer
          indicates whose turn it is now. Possible values are CheckersData.RED and CheckersData.BLACK

        • selectedRow

          int selectedRow
          If the current player has selected a piece to move, these give the row and column containing that piece. If no piece is yet selected, then selectedRow is -1.

        • selectedCol

          int selectedCol
          If the current player has selected a piece to move, these give the row and column containing that piece. If no piece is yet selected, then selectedRow is -1.

        • legalMoves

          CheckersMove[] legalMoves
          An array containing the legal moves for the current player

        • networker

          ChatConnectionHandler networker
          Object that performs all networking and IO

        • incoming

          javax.swing.JTextArea incoming
          Display of incoming messages

        • outgoing

          javax.swing.JTextField outgoing
          Input field for outgoing messages
